Rule.Name: MAIN BODY GEOMETRY
Rule.Text:
ACTIVE_ROOT_OFFSET_FROM_TUBE=(ROUNDUP_LENGTH_OF_TUBE+FLANGE_THICKNESS)+(((ACTIVE_DIAMETER-TUBE_OD)/2/(Tan(ANGLE*(PI/180)))))
TIP_DIAMETER = BORE_DIAMETER + 40 mm
END_FILLET = (TIP_DIAMETER/2)-(BORE_DIAMETER/2)
FINAL_END_FILLET = END_FILLET/2
FIXED_ROOT_DIA_LENGTH = BORE_DIAMETER + 40 mm
TRANSITION_LENGTH = FIXED_ROOT_DIA_LENGTH * 0.6 ul
TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH =(ACTIVE_ROOT_OFFSET_FROM_TUBE + ACTIVE_LENGTH)
SHRINKAGE_LENGTH = TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH * SHRINKAGE_VALUE

Rule.Name: FLANGE
Rule.Text:
FLANGE_ID = BORE_DIAMETER + 30 mm
FLANGE_EXTERNAL_DIAMETER = ROOT_DIAMETER - 2 * 15 mm
If FLANGE_THICKNESS_SELECT = "OCEANEERING" Then FLANGE_THICKNESS = THREAD_DEPTH + ( 0.5 ul * MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER ) + 15 mm
If FLANGE_THICKNESS_SELECT = "BALMORAL" Then FLANGE_THICKNESS = THREAD_DEPTH + ( 0.5 ul * MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER ) + FLANGE_ADD
FLANGE_FILLET = FLANGE_THICKNESS * 0.4 ul
CLAMPED_THICKNESS = FLANGE_THICKNESS - NUT_COUNTERBORE_DEPTH

Rule.Name: MATING HOLES
Rule.Text:
If MATING_HOLE_PCD_SELECT = "BALMORAL STANDARD" Then MATING_HOLE_PCD = FLANGE_EXTERNAL_DIAMETER - ( 2 ul * MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER )
If MATING_HOLE_PCD_SELECT = "CLIENT SPECIFIED" Then MATING_HOLE_PCD = CLIENT_MATING_HOLE_PCD
THREAD_DEPTH = ( ( MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER * 2 ul ) + 10 mm ) + 10 mm
If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 8 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M8x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 10 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M10x1.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 12 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M12x1.75" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 16 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M16x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 20 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M20x2.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 24 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M24x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 30 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M30x3.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 36 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M36x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 42 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M42x4.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 45 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M45x4.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 48 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M48x5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 52 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M52x5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 56 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M56x6.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 60 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M60x5.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 64 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M64x6"
If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 8 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M8x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 10 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M10x1.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 12 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M12x1.75" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 16 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M16x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 20 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M20x2.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 24 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M24x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 30 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M30x3.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 36 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M36x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 42 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M42x4.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 45 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M45x4.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 48 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M48x5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 52 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M52x5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 56 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M56x6.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 60 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M60x5.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 64 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M64x6"
If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 8 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M8x1" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 10 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M10x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 12 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M12x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 16 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M16x1.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 20 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M20x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 24 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M24x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 30 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M30x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 36 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M36x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 42 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M42x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 45 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M45x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 48 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M48x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 52 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M52x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 56 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M56x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 60 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M60x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 64 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("MATING HOLE") = "M64x4"
If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 8 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M8x1" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 10 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M10x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 12 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M12x1.25" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 16 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M16x1.5" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 20 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M20x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 24 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M24x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 30 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M30x2" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 36 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M36x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 42 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M42x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 45 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M45x3" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 48 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M48x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 52 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M52x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 56 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M56x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 60 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M60x4" If MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER = 64 And MATING_HOLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("CLIENT STUD THREAD") = "M64x4"
STUD_LENGTH = THREAD_DEPTH + CLIENT_FLANGE_THICKNESS + (MATING_HOLE_DIAMETER * 2)

Rule.Name: TUBE
Rule.Text:
TUBE_ID = BORE_DIAMETER + 30 mm
TUBE_OD = TUBE_ID + TUBE_THICKNESS*2
LENGTH_OF_TUBE = Round (FLANGE_EXTERNAL_DIAMETER * TUBE_LENGTH_CONTROL)
TUBE_THK = ( TUBE_OD - TUBE_ID ) / 2 ul
ROUNDUP_LENGTH_OF_TUBE = Round(LENGTH_OF_TUBE / 2 mm) * 2 mm

Rule.Name: SPINDLE
Rule.Text:
SPINDLE_THK_DIAMETER = Round( ( ( ( SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER / 4 ul ) * 2 ul ) + SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER ) * 1.5 ul )
SPINDLE_PROTRUDING_INTO_PU_LENGTH =Round((LENGTH_OF_TUBE-(DISTANCE_BETWEEN_TUBE_AND_SPINDLE/(Tan(PETRUDING_ANGLE*(PI/180)))))-RING_THK)
SPINDLE_LEG_LENGTH = FLANGE_THICKNESS - 2 mm
SPINDLE_THK_LENGTH = SPINDLE_PROTRUDING_INTO_PU_LENGTH * 0.6
SPINDLE_TAPERED_LENGTH = SPINDLE_PROTRUDING_INTO_PU_LENGTH * 0.4 ul
SPINDLE_CLEARANCE_HOLE= SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER + 2 mm
SPINDLE_FILLET = SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER * 0.1 ul
ROUNDUP_SPINDLE_THK_DIAMETER = Round(SPINDLE_THK_DIAMETER / 1 mm) * 1 mm
SPINDLE_THREAD_LENGTH = NUT_COUNTERBORE_DEPTH + 5 mm
DISTANCE_BETWEEN_TUBE_AND_SPINDLE = ( SPINDLE_PCD - TUBE_OD ) / 2 ul

Rule.Name: SPINDLE THREAD
Rule.Text:
NUT_COUNTERBORE_DEPTH = SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER + 5 mm
If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 20 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 27 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 29 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 42 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 50 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 54 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 70 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 81 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 98 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 105 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 115 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 125 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 134 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 144 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 Then BOLT_HEAD_CLEARANCE = 154
If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M8x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M10x1.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M12x1.75" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M16x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M20x2.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M24x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M30x3.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M36x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M42x4.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M45x4.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M48x5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M52x5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M56x5.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M60x5.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M64x6"
If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M8x1" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M10x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M12x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M16x1.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M20x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M24x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M30x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M36x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M42x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M45x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M48x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M52x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M56x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M60x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD") = "M64x4"

Rule.Name: SINGLE SPINDLE THREAD
Rule.Text:
If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M8x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M10x1.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M12x1.75" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M16x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M20x2.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M24x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M30x3.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M36x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M42x4.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M45x4.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M48x5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M52x5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M56x5.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M60x5.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("COARSE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M64x6"
If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M8x1" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M10x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M12x1.25" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M16x1.5" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M20x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M24x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M30x2" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M36x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M42x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M45x3" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M48x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M52x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M56x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M60x4" If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 And SPINDLE_PITCH = ("FINE") Then Feature.ThreadDesignation("SPINDLE THREAD SINGLE") = "M64x4"

Rule.Name: BACK PLATE
Rule.Text: PLATE_RECESS = Round (BORE_DIAMETER * SHRINKAGE_VALUE + ( TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH / 1000 ul ) + 3 mm)

Rule.Name: MANDREL
Rule.Text:
MANDREL_TIP_DIAMETER = BORE_DIAMETER * SHRINKAGE_VALUE
MANDREL_LENGTH = ( SHRINKAGE_LENGTH * SHRINKAGE_VALUE ) + LENGTH_OF_PU_ADDED_TO_SHRINKAGE + 50 mm
MANDREL_LARGE_END = Round (BORE_DIAMETER * SHRINKAGE_VALUE + ( TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH / 1000 ul ))

Rule.Name: FEA NUT
Rule.Text: If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 8 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 6.8 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 10 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 8.4 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 12 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 10.8 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 16 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 14.8 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 20 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 18 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 22 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 19.4 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 24 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 21.5 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 30 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 25.6 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 36 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 31 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 42 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 34 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 45 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 36 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 48 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 38 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 52 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 42 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 56 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 45 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 60 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 48 If SPINDLE_THREAD_DIAMETER = 64 Then FEA_NUT_HEIGHT = 51

Rule.Name: VOLUME RULE
Rule.Text:
CORE_VOLUME = (PI * ((TIP_DIAMETER/2) * (TIP_DIAMETER/2))) * TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH
CONE_VOLUME = (PI * ACTIVE_LENGTH * ((ACTIVE_DIAMETER/2) * (ACTIVE_DIAMETER/2)) + ((TIP_DIAMETER/2) * (TIP_DIAMETER/2)) + (ACTIVE_DIAMETER/2) * (TIP_DIAMETER/2)) /3
ROOT_VOLUME = ((PI * ((ACTIVE_DIAMETER/2) * (ACTIVE_DIAMETER))) * (TOTAL_STIFFENER_LENGTH - ACTIVE_LENGTH - FLANGE_THICKNESS ))
PU_VOLUME = (CONE_VOLUME + ROOT_VOLUME) - CORE_VOLUME

Rule.Name: PRODUCTION RULES
Rule.Text: If BORE_DIAMETER <= 300 mm Then MANDREL_MOUNTING_PCD = 90 mm If BORE_DIAMETER > 300 mm Then MANDREL_MOUNTING_PCD = 180 mm
